website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer to use clean beauty products, you will be impressed with the quality ingredients and rich moisturizers in this tinted moisturizer.
pros: Garners praise for being 100% natural and containing nourishing plant-based ingredients, 80% of which are produced organically
Cruelty-free and doesn't contain any harsh chemicals or artificial additives
cons: Scent is on the strong side
Shades lean too warm to work on all skin tones

customer_reviews.title: Not really moisturizer...
customer_reviews.text: I just wouldn’t call this a moisturizer. I was expecting something thick and creamy, but this is more liquidy. I like the tone, it worked with my skin... but I do have to mix it with my regular moisturizer which was something I was looking forward to stop doing in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Ma. Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Naturally beautiful and glowing skin with SPF 15!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. It's AMAZING! It keeps my skin glowing, healthy and acne free. It is organic, so I know it is healthy for me and my skin. I wear it everyday for the SPF benefits and to always have a beautiful complexion. And if I forget to wash my face one night, it's not a big deal cause this is a non- clogging moisturizer first and foremost. I just recently discovered it has gluten in it though, which I am intolerant of, so I'm gonna try some of the other organic tinted moisterizers in the physicians line, hopefully they are all as phenomenal as this!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa HeartTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend - Not a good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on ordering even though some reviewers said it wasn't a good moisturizer. I've used and liked Physician products in the past, but I should have taken the advice! If you have dry skin, this won't be for you. The color tint was good but it was not creamy, and felt dry on my skin. Have used twice, but had to mix with my regular moisturizer. It also had a terrible odor when first opened that was definitely from the sunscreen ingredients. Although the odor had dissipated on opening the cap a 2nd time, it's still not something I will use again.
customer_reviews.author: Silver68

customer_reviews.title: Great for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over 3 years, but only recently, started using it everyday. I first use moisturizer with SPF and then apply this on top. I can't figure out why, but this combination has done wonders for my skin. Skin is soft and blemish free and well-moisturized all day without getting oily, also hides minor imperfections very well. I have normal skin that tends to get dry during winters. I don't wear make-up but apply eyeliner and this foundation for a night out. This is a must-have for me, I will be stocking up.
customer_reviews.author: V Seldon

customer_reviews.title: Holistic top of the line best price tinted moisturizer that I have found
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly top of the line organics but 15 times better than anything you can get on the open market that used to sell it at CVS Walmart target and Walgreens but pretty much most places have phased it out and carry other products but not much for the organics this is all a marketing scheme. I like to stretch my dollar far and this is a tinted moisturizerA much better price than anyplace else on the market much better ingredients I give it my best rating because it deserves it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: TALC
customer_reviews.text: Feels sticky, doesn’t moisturize (drying), AND HAS TALC IN IT.
customer_reviews.author: Emerimerie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous! I've been wearing makeup since I was 14 which is over 50 year so I can safely say I've tried them all. For a tinted moisturizer the coverage is great, much better than any other I've tried that never concealed anything. Not only great coverage, it goes on smoothly, dries quickly and as an added bonus has reduced my uneven skin tone (aka age spots). Definitely will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite foundation
customer_reviews.text: I’m not someone who wears foundation on a regular basis but after buying this, I found myself wanting to put it on every morning! Other foundations I felt were too heavy or I only wore them when I was going out but wasn’t an everyday wear. This is super light weight, hydrating, and still provides a light coverage to hind small blemishes. I’ll be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a darn
customer_reviews.text: Im sorry but I also saw the rave reviews for a organic tinted moisturizer and was excited to try it out however on application number one it didn't cover the color really didn't even show up like it's not a mixed right or consistent product so buyer beware because there are issues with returning this item ....they won't let you . I'm not happy with that at all bieng stuck with a crap product !
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bourland

customer_reviews.title: Best tinted moisturizer that I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I love this tinted moisturizer! I have very dry, sensitive skin with acne scars. I use this when I just want to go out and have that "no makeup" look. I apply with a wet sponge and it looks just like my actual skin! You can hardly tell that it's makeup. Then, once it dries, it doesn't feel cakey or wet. I don't put powder over the top either. It dries down just like a normal moisturizer would. Even though it's not full coverage, the coverage over my redness is very noticeable!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Feels so nice on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hard time finding foundations that match my skin tone, seeing how I'm very fair. This product matches me very well. It came on time and was in perfect condition. There was a little foil cap underneath the green lid, which let me know the bottle was full. I really like how the product feels on my skin, too. It goes on very smoothly and offers a lot of coverage without feeling like I'm wearing a mask. A very good product for a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this product. To me, a moisturizer should feel "creamy" but this feels like water. It's almost impossible to get it spread around your face before it starts to dry. It also came up in a search for sensitive skin, but when I put it on my face after washing, it burns. It is worse than my regular foundation which I have now gone back to after throwing this product in the trash. The intense lavender smell is a bit much as well, although as others have noted, that does dissipate quickly and does not seem to linger on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking it would work like a normal BB cream. It was super watery and messy. I do not like the smell at all. I thought it had a smell because its organic, but its just rubbing alcohol. It's a little darker than I expected it to be and it seems to dry out my skin than to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive, works for me
customer_reviews.text: All my adult life I'very been looking for a sunscreen and a foundation that didn't irritate my skin. I'very even tried physicians formula before, but not the organic. I figured I'd give it a shot. My skin is just as smooth and calm the day after wearing this as the day before. The coverage is great. You can apply a thin layer, or use more for more coverage. It looks very natural. People don't notice the makeup, but my husband said I looked radiant.
customer_reviews.author: alyson

customer_reviews.title: Love this and so glad I found it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been unable to find this at the local store. Love this product and have been using it for years. I was worried I wouldn't be able to get it again. The fear of trying to find another product that didn't irritate my very sensitive skin and matched my skin color again was terrifying. I'm so glad I found this on Amazon. It is also light and you don't look like you're wearing a mask or stage makeup when wearing this. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: People may not love this, but I am a HUGE fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like putting heavy make up on my face. I am 37 and I've using this product religiously for the past..... decade? I LOVE this, it just gives me enough moisture and even skin tone and once I put my Chanel translucent powder, which also I've been using for last decade, it makes my skin perfect in my opinion. I know they only offer 3? shades and it's been discontinued from PH? since Amazon is the only place I can get this product now... since I realized that, I've been trying few other drugstore foundations (Maybelline FitMe, PH Healthy, PH cusion) but I still think this is the best. So I will be stocking up....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this Tinted Moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this Tinted Moisturizer. I have very sensitive skin and I am allergic to most cosmetic products and this is the only product I can use now. I also have not had a single break-out since using it. I use it daily for the past 2 years. I also use the Physicians Formula bronzers with success. I hope they never stop making this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: gee

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I was using their CC cream for a while, but it was just too thick under powder, especially on hot days in Texas. I use this product every day. It's super light and dries fairly quickly without leaving me with an oily residue. The coverage is pretty good, better than I expected. I still use a concealer under my eyes. The great thing is if I want to go makeup free (usually at least 2x/week) this product makes me look fresh faced and not like I just rolled out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: This product have disagreeable smell, and it smell not like a natural product, it smell like something synthetic and chemical, and I can't stand this smell. I had an unpleasant sensation on my skin. But, unfortunately, YOU CAN'T RETURN IT, so, I do not recommend this product. DON'T BY IT !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin glow
customer_reviews.text: I've been on a search for foundation for quite some time. I've tried all types of expensive and inexpensive stuff and this product is my favorite. It evens out my skin and leaves a glow. I love it! The smell is quite strong, it smells like tea tree oil, but b it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gray

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Physicians Formula for a few years now & LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: With my very sensitive skin, it took me a while to find something I can use. I have been using Physicians Formula for a few years now & LOVE IT!!! It's organic line is just want I need. My look is natural, low maintenance, so this fits the bill. It's great all year round, since it has SPF in it. In the summer I use this with a little bit of powder. In the winter I use it under foundation. Doesn't clog my pores.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBee

customer_reviews.title: The best liquid "foundation" I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. As I age I've had to change up my makeup routine. Many foundations now look slightly cakey or overdone once I passed 40. A friend of mine turned me on to this tinted moisturizer and it's fantastic! It has great coverage, really evens out the skin tone, and adds another layer of moisture under my powder. I have gotten rid of all my liquid foundations and use this exclusively. Finishing powders adhere to it nicely and it doesn't seem to sweat off in our intense heat. Bottom line: inexpensive, great coverage, solid product, and doesn't irritate my skin in any way.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Minus two stars because I was very disappointed with the texture and how it pretty much caked ...
customer_reviews.text: Very dry and orangy. I'm giving it three stars because of the ingredients and the rating on EWG. Minus two stars because I was very disappointed with the texture and how it pretty much caked on my face and settled into every wrinkle I try to hide. It also left an orangy color all over my face. Guess I'll have to stick to my toxic cover girl 😁
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted
customer_reviews.text: The (inner) box that the tube of makeup came in was crushed. The makeup itself is runny and not the creamy consistency that it should be. I am going to use it anyway because I don't want to return it. Update: I used it today and it smelled so bad that I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very light moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: My Aveeno CC moisturizer was discontinued; so I had to find a new one. Gave this a try and actually like it much better than the Aveeno. It is more water based than Aveeno and absorbs quickly into skin. The result is less fine lines show up and my face looks more natural.
customer_reviews.author: looking 4 right workout

customer_reviews.title: Love it...will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this for the first time and love it. It moisturizes and is a foundation at the same time, with no parabens, etc. Although it’s a light tint, it still covers nicely and looks natural. I have ‘old skin,’ so it isn’t easy to find this combination.
customer_reviews.author: Aslan's Child

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer nice light coverage with no irritation
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for me. I don't wear make and wanted something light to cover my rosaeca but that did not irritate. I really love this.It only lightly covers but it is not heavy at all. I love the spf and how easily it absorbs into the skin. The color is great for me, I have used the physicians Formula CC cream but it's only available in the light to natural and it is a bit light for my skin tone. This blends wonderfully into my skin tone. It provides less coverage than their CC cream and feels lighter which I really like especially for summer. No irritation even after hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: DG Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Thin & a bit pale, but still good.
customer_reviews.text: Light coverage in more ways than one- consistency is thin & runny. I can tilt the bottle and it will drip right out. Also for pale skin types- I’m not that tan, but it does make me a little pale. However, it oxidizes and after a while matches my skin. (Or it’s been rubbed away by then, lol). Huge plus side- easy to apply & it doesn’t break me out- exactly what I need as my go to when I’m rushing or having break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite. Best I’ve ever had. It blends in perfectly, no streaks. Very natural looking, moisturizing. Great price. Doesn’t feel greasy at all, just feels like lotion but makes your skin look beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Eyes Itch
customer_reviews.text: I do love the way this product looks on my skin, but it makes my sensitive eyes itch. I had high hopes that this product would work for me because the Physicians Formula mascara is the only one I’ve ever tried that does not irritate my eyes (I will never use anything else!), however I will have to resume my search for a SPF tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation ever. It's so lightweight, you don't even know you're wearing it. The color is perfect for my fair skin. It blends well and looks great on days when I wear makeup and days when I don't and just want to brighten up/add glow to my skin. My skin is pretty dry, and it adds just the right amount of moisture. It's not greasy whatsoever. It's creamy and it applies perfectly every single time for me. It gives me such a youthful healthy glow. Not to mention, it's a healthy natural choice. I don't have to feel like I'm doing something good for my skin but bad for my health.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product to replace my old Aveeno tinted moisturizer. Unfortunately, my sensitive skin did not like this product and a rash broke out all over my face after 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing at all.
customer_reviews.text: This has zero coverage and is completely runny. Smells like you're applying lavender oil to your face. Not moisturizing at all. My skin actually felt tight and shiny after applying.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Felt weird n my skin, can’t return
customer_reviews.text: This felt greasy and dirty on my skin. I have very sensitive skin so I have to be careful. I break out easily. Wanted to return it but no returns. Sitting in my make up graveyard!
customer_reviews.author: Drtvgal

customer_reviews.title: Another makeup bag staple
customer_reviews.text: I am not a foundation wearer, but as I have gotten older, feel the need to use a bit more coverage. This is super lightweight and easy to put on every day. I really love it’s an affordable quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The consistency is very runny. The smell is rather foul (although it does dissipate once on the skin). Coverage is minimal at best. While there is some tint, it seems to accentuate the very areas I'm trying to diminish. It also takes awhile to dry. My goal was to find a liquid makeup base: 1. with natural ingredients, and 2. that was reasonably priced, and 3. that provided coverage similar to Aveeno. This PF Organic Wear fits the first two goals, but definitely not the third. Will keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: HappyInTheWoodsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best Non-toxic foundation alternative for Sensitive Skin, Especially to Preserve Youthfulness!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product and use it DAILY!! I had been afraid to use ANY moisturizer on my acne-prone skin, but noticed a shift leading up to my 50th birthday, so I gave it a try & was enamored with my dewier, fresher complexion!!
customer_reviews.author: NewDawn6

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. Made my face break out.. if you have sensitive skill be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. This is a great product for those who don’t like heavy concealer. It gives enough coverage without the weight. I enjoyed this product very much and it blends perfectly! Apply with your fingers or a makeup sponge
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Works very well on my skin that ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Works very well on my skin that is normal/dry. Moisturizes all day and looks slightly dewy. My only complaint is that the color is slightly darker than my skin, but I'm so fair it's hard to find any product that matches exactly (just blend it in really well!). My skin actually feels and looks better after using this for about a week. And it doesn't smell harsh like my old makeup. Light coverage, so if you have blemishes you'll still need a concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Bone

customer_reviews.title: Decent tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in the past and am a return customer. I like the color and it does moisturize. It has a faint smell when first applied but it is not unpleasant to me. It is a little greasy as the day goes on, but I do have slightly oily skin. I'll probably purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewing Momma

customer_reviews.title: The clear liquid bothers me
customer_reviews.text: The color is to light for me and if you read my review on their Concealer than you know about the clear liquid that comes out before the color and I do not like that . So I will not try another color.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Feels weird to apply. Poor coverage
customer_reviews.text: I normally like this brand, but this goes on watery and leaves me feeling dry instead of moisturized. It doesn't cover well and led to breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: ... and never realized this tinted moisturizer was oxidizing so bad on my face until I wore it by itself
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this product for almost a year and never realized this tinted moisturizer was oxidizing so bad on my face until I wore it by itself. I usually mix this product with other foundations and did like the finish but man this whole time this was the one that made my face so dark and I’m more light than fair. I can’t believe it took this long to realized it.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I never wear makeup - Like at all. I normally only use a moisturizer and go about my day. But there are days when I have meetings like I would like to wear something to help even out my skin tone. This is perfect. I hate how heavy most make-ups are and I always breakout from them. This is the first product that is light, looks natural, and doesn't cause me to breakout. If you are looking for a lot of coverage this is not for you. If you are looking to just even things out a bit then I cannot recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: new go to protection makeup product
customer_reviews.text: love love this product. had bought at tarket a while back and now it will be my go to.. very creamy and protect all day with a sheer look.
customer_reviews.author: mrs. itzi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tinted moisturizer with spf!!! It is very sheer coverage, but enough to cover the redness on my face if I have an pimple. I am not a make-up type gal, so I wanted to find something to wear everyday, wouldn't break out my face and didn't have a TON of nasty chemicals in it! The smell is a little overwhelming when you put it on, but goes away after a few seconds. I would highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: beeolson22

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! Great natural ingredients, effective quality product. Such a nice, lightly tinted moisturizer. Do not put this on your eye area or too close to your eyes!!!!!! It will burn.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Maggio

customer_reviews.title: STINKS!
customer_reviews.text: Runny out of the tube (don't we put runny things into bottles and thick things in tubes? isn't that the normal way?), and smells honest-to-god like latex paint. decent coverage, and feels moisturizing enough, but that SMELL.
customer_reviews.author: S. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Thin thin thin thin thin
customer_reviews.text: Basically this product has a strong lavender smell like you might find in certain herbal medicines which contain lavender and tea tree oil, and is very, very thin. This makes it difficult to apply and also provides very little coverage- I rarely have blemishes- just looking for something to even out freckles, cover some places where I'm prone to blackheads on my nose, etc. I put this on and it looked literally the same as bare skin. I tried applying more and I looked orange. I totally thought the "it makes me look orange!" thing was an exaggeration for when the coloring looks off, but this seriously was orange.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Witch

customer_reviews.title: Light cream
customer_reviews.text: It's very light cream, not heavy or greasy feeling on the skin. The color I picked was a bit light for my skin, but it looks nice. I have sensitive skin, and have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected based on other reviews
customer_reviews.text: The tinted moisturizer has a funky smell and odd consistency. Felt and smelled like I was applying a mud mask. There was a little burn upon application that went away. Coverage not so great.
customer_reviews.author: S Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Thin and very sheer- possibly too sheer, I haven’t decided. I do hate the smell. This tube will last me a couple months so I have time to keep looking
customer_reviews.author: Beverly H

customer_reviews.title: A natural looking foundation
customer_reviews.text: I use this tinted moisturizer in the place of foundation. It’s great that it has sunscreen, is lightweight, and rated well by EWG.
customer_reviews.author: pjc

customer_reviews.title: Good face lotion/sunscreen with ivory color for smooth coverage
customer_reviews.text: This has a strong smell to it but goes on smoothly. I put in on under my makeup or just use it by itself. Gives my skin a nice balanced look. Like it for the sun protection. It's very "liquidy" and comes out super fast so I have made a couple messes with it. I use it with a makeup sponge and it rubs in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Scutti's

customer_reviews.title: Thick and smelly
customer_reviews.text: This product was so thick and cakey that it was difficult to spread on my face and what I did spread just sat on the surface. Not at all a moisturizer. It also smelled like burnt plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is light coverage and moisturizing. If you want a heavy foundation, this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Grill master

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Purchase this time!
customer_reviews.text: Cream is too thin, no coverage at all. Smell isn't the same as the one I usually buy. Has the same name, but not the same one that I have bought for over a year now. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T. RAY

customer_reviews.title: must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love how light weight this is and doesn't irritate my skin. I use it year round. It does a beautiful job blending in the summer when my face has a little more color. I have been using this for years and get compliments on my skin all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Pros: light scent of lavender nice light coverage evens skin tone nicely not oily makes my face matte Do not expect a huge tube of moisturizer, and do not expect heavy coverage. It did not advertise that it would be a heavy coverage, so do not rate it down if it did not promise you this. Read the descriptions. If you have a lot of dark scars and acne, go for a foundation and concealer. Overall, it is great for those with good skin with minor problems that need evening out. It does moiturize my dry areas on my face.
customer_reviews.author: haha

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm 75 and no longer have the energy to do makeup. This is a good color, easy to apply, and I don't feel so bad if I forget to take it off at night.
customer_reviews.author: Just Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I love this tinted moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I have extraordinarily sensitive skin. I am a fair redhead and just about everything irritates my skin. This moisturizer is lightly tinted and it is a light moisturizer which is perfect for me. If you need heavy coverage like a heavy foundation, this is not for you. You could easily wear this under makeup however, which might provide a more even finish. The one thing I really like about this product, compared to other products, it has a good nontoxic rating with the Environmental Working Group. Their rating for this product can be seen here: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Single Tech Geek Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Light Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tinted moisturizer. I don't like to wear a lot of makeup, but I needed something when my acne flaired up. This wasn't heavy, did a decent coverage job and was easy to apply. I don't recommend it for heavy coverage, and it's not for really dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this work out because of good price but after a couple times using it had ok coverage but made me break out.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Bad looking tan
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a good product at first. The ingredients still aren’t that “clean”. Also it literally gives you a fake tan. I bought it to use instead of heavy makeup and multiple people asked me where I got my tan from. It is also not a good tan it looks fake and orangey. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to like this because I love physicians formula but it didn't provide any coverage, and yet left a dewy residue on my skin. I also don't know if it was just the bottle I received or what but it had a very strong odor to it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel

customer_reviews.title: Soft, smooth, glowing
customer_reviews.text: Out of all my makeups I use, this is my favorite base/liquid foundation/BB cream hands down. It isn't heavy (make sure you blend it evenly and let it dry before applying next layer) and it is breathable. In a hot summer it isn't going to stay without setting spray, but during the other three seasons it works perfect under my mineral powder. Love it. No red showing at all. Easy to just where this an eyeliner if I'm running late.
customer_reviews.author: HannahP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and light!
customer_reviews.text: Love the light weight and transparency, have used this and nothing else, it’s wonderful and smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: wendy bernacki

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a light foundation
customer_reviews.text: This works as a light foundation not so much a moisturizer. It doesn’t irritate my skin and is a nice light color that helps blend blotchy skin. I use it with the powder too. Makes my skin look smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great look but minor breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot but it seems to clog my pores and cause minor breakouts after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler & Brittany W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what i woukd do without it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have found this make-up about 5 years ago, and won't buy anything else! My Wal-Mart stopped stocking it, and freaked out thinking they stopped making it all together 😠 Then I found it on here, thankfully! I love the lightweight feeling, natural coverage, and natural look. I also have sensitive skin and is somehat dry at times, this make-up is great for my issues. I really do have a glow after I put it on. My skin feels so soft and moisterized, not greasy. What would I do without it????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All natural
customer_reviews.text: All time favorite.. been using this product for years. Rarely wear makeup but every do often this is my go to. Light non greasy
customer_reviews.author: MARIA  C.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: My skin has never been so oily. I already have slightly oily skin and I was hoping for something that was lighter so I thought this tinted moisturizer would be perfect. I was wrong. Within an hour of literally sitting at work it felt like I had just gone running and my face felt disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Jader

customer_reviews.title: Nice light coverage and good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It really helped with my dry winter skin. I wasn't expecting the mint to make my skin cool and tingly but it did. I have somewhat sensitive skin and I was ok with it. It does make a mess in the lid if stored cap down which wqsted some product. It has a thin formula and quickly comes out of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several different tinted moisturizers and this one makes me look a little pale/white. A darker shade may work but it goes on lighter than what the cream appears to be. Not so bad that I’ll throw it away, but I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Light natural coverage that does not irritate skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation. It's nice and light, and gives natural coverage. It doesn't look like I am wearing makeup. It also doesn't irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell and dried my skin out so bad it ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible smell and dried my skin out so bad it made a rash. If you have dry or sensitive skin, don’t use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Grady

customer_reviews.title: Works well but wish it came in darker shades
customer_reviews.text: This is a little lighter in shade than expected, and I'm disappointed they don't make or sell a Medium or darker tone. With that being said, I used this product all winter and was pleased with it. It does not provide heavy coverage, so if you are expecting foundation-like coverage, you won't get it. But for light coverage, it's great. Doesn't make me break out, and stays on my face all day.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyjay

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Please get this back in stock in both choices I love this . It is just right for me. I got the light one and wanting to order the tan now but it is out of stock and it is saying din’t Know if it will come back in stock. Please do restock it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorene Ballew

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Very light and creamy, love that it moisturizes and covers up flaws all in one application!
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: My everyday makeup!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT. If you try to buy this at Ulta you will end up paying $5-10 more! This moisturizer doesn’t feel cakey and ended up evening out my natural complexion! My skin is moisturized and chemical free! I’m very pale and this product didn’t have an orange tint. I switched to this brand to replace my old foundation!
customer_reviews.author: tvnvh

customer_reviews.title: definitely light coverage
customer_reviews.text: pro... light coverage, its great to cover red tent to face but this is not for someone with blemishes. con... smells bad and a little sticky, but can be resolved with a little face power on top!!
customer_reviews.author: kim atwood

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy step for people like me who don't like to wear tons of makeup but want to look decent. Love that it has spf with it and is a moisturizer!
customer_reviews.author: jags1leo17

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite concealer/moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve used the CC cream and BB cream and it was too thick for my taste. This product is my all time favorite! It is so smooth and light. I always get compliments on how dewy my skin looks too, I always say it’s the product:)
customer_reviews.author: Baylie Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Moms on the go!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! It applies so easily, I just put a nickel-sized dollup on my fingers, rub it all over my face (like lotion) and, viola! Done! It’s very lightweight and easy to spread. I’m a mom of 6, so I hardly have time to do make up. This (plus Physicians Formula loose powder) and a little mascara... I’m good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Not very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: It’s very runny, but I still like it, and it’s got just the right amount of tint. Not very moisturizing though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell bad, so uselessly.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible smell, like alcohol. I has to take out of my skin so quickly. I think is expired. I put it in trash.
customer_reviews.author: Melody7

customer_reviews.text: Not very good coverage but it's great in every other way
customer_reviews.author: coral

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Great for the lady that wants a natural look, but doesn't want to wear a ton of makeup. I think I did buy one that was alittle too dark for my skin tone, but it still works. I think the color samples online are a bit misleading. It smells like the spa which to me smells great and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S Berry

customer_reviews.title: THIS price cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite foundation and when I saw this deal, I doubled my order. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite skin tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite skin tinted moisturizer. My skin is super sensitive and reacts to almost every product I put on my skin, and this product is light simple and gentle. I like the dewy glow my skin has when I wear it. It's a natural glowing look. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm using Differin (retinol) which is causing my skin to become very dry and flaky. As a result I can't wear regular foundation because it flakes off and looks awful. This is very moisturizing and sheer, and I like the natural glow it gives me without excentuating the dryness of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product! (light coverage)
customer_reviews.text: This is for light coverage for sure, but you can build on it. Has a good smell and I honestly love how it applies on my skin. I definitely noticed a healthy glow/complexion with this product. I personally would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I wish i could find this light lotion in stores. It keeps my face moisturized and has light coverage to even my skin out. I love the lavender smell, but beware, it is pretty strong when you first put it on. I use e.l.f. powder to set it and my face is happy. Doesn't feel heavy like foundation. I try to avoid heavy chemicals in personal products. This is a great natural tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: MissB

customer_reviews.title: the best makeup
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff and have it on a subscription.
customer_reviews.author: BHM

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen foundation tint
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those who dont cake on lots of foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great for Everyday
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to foundation. Until I just figured out that it's only a tinted moisturizer! :) :) I've been loving it for years and think that for special occasions I will add a foundation, but this is really all that's needed.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product, Lightweight Feel
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't like how watery/runny the product was, but now, compared to many other BB or CC creams I've used, I like the lightweight feel (well suited for summer). Also, the smell is refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget D

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The sun protection appears adequate and I love that it's all physical barrier and non chemical. It goes on light and the color matches my complexion well. It blends easily with fingertips. I actually have gotten compliments about the smell too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well with dry sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my second year using this product and I figured I should finally give it a review. I have sensitive dry skin and barely use any skin care. This product gives no skin reaction even if I use it without daily face cream.
customer_reviews.author: taniani

product_meta.title: Physicians Formula Organic Wear 100% Natural Tinted Moisturizer, Light To Natural Organics, 1.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Light to Natural OrganicsPhysicians Formula organic wear 100% natural tinted moisturizer, light to natural organics lightweight tinted moisturizer hydrates skin and evens out skin tone with sheer and natural coverage. Infused with Organic Fruit Water to help nourish and restore skin's moisture balance. SPF 15 naturally protects skin from environmental damage for a healthy-looking complexion. A 100% natural origin tinted moisturizer, formulated with 80% certified organic ingredients, including jojoba seed oil, sunflower seed oil, avocado oil, and shea butter to moisturize the skin.
feature_bullets: PHYSICIANS FORMULA NATURAL TINTED MOISTURIZER: This Natural Origin tinted facial moisturizer, is carefully formulated with 80% certified organic ingredients, including jojoba seed oil, sunflower seed oil, avocado oil & shea butter to moisturize the skin.

TINTED MOISTURIZER WITH SPF: With skin balancing sheer coverage & light color correction, this 100% natural tinted moisturizer evens skin tone, blurs imperfections and enhances the natural appearance of skin for a flawless, woke up like this look.

PUT YOUR BEST FACE FORWARD: From primers to highlighters, we offer a full face of makeup to help you build a foundation for any look, and all without irritating ingredients or harsh additives. Just long-wearing, lushly pigmented, quality cosmetics.

Physician's Formula offers a full line of skin care and makeup for sensitive skin, including mascaras, lipsticks, concealers, eyeliners, eyeshadow palettes, bb creams, bronzers & primers. Our products are hypoallergenic & safe for sensitive skin and eyes.
HEALTHY BEAUTY PRODUCTS: Every one of our products is hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin & eyes, & created without any of the 150+ known harsh ingredients found in other personal care items.
